name: Mother Duck
description:
Life in the hood is hard. Daddy duck is gone - he packed his shit and left you for good. But you are a strong interdependent Mother Duck: You will survive.

Gather bread for you and your ducklings using WASD (to move) and SPACE (to flap you wings). Moving will burn away fat, so don't burn more fat than you consume by gathering bread, remember resources are scarce in the hood!

Credits (In alphabetical order):

Anders Rosbæk
Kasper Lind Sørensen (@goibon)
Lukas Kern
Nils Sørensen (@lolinc_)
Rasmus Mølck Nilsson
